action.action-desc: Mr. Issa (for himself, Mr. Burgess, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mrs. Lesko, and Mr. Keller) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of Homeland Security from enacting certain alternative to detention programs for aliens, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Alternatives to Detention for Illegals Act of 2022.

section.header: Prohibition on certain alternative to detention programs
section.text: Beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act, no Federal funds may be used by the Secretary of Homeland Security to enact any program with respect to the use of a home curfew or other alternatives to detention for an alien who is in the custody of the Secretary and housed at an immigration detention center.
